runs.comm: just short of a length, on off stump, defended towards mid-on
hint of width outside off, short of a length, cracked down to third man with a strong square cut off the back foot
opens the face and steers a length ball down to third man
straight at Roy, bunted to the right of mid-on with a straight bat
a flowing square drive, Anwar goes fuller, Hales onto the front foot but finds point
angled in from short of a length, worked off the hip to deep square...steady opening over
full outside off, 79mph, Hales is nicely onto the front foot again and drives to cover
over the top this time, not quite perfectly time, full at off stump, Hales makes a step down the pitch and lofts it over wide mid-oiff
straighter delivery, not so full, flicked from around off stump into the leg side
lovely delivery! Pushed across outside off, back of a length, extra bounce and a hint of movement away from Roy as he prods away from his body
well bowled again, fuller this time, on middle and leg, Roy is squared up a little as the bat slices across the line and the thick outer edge goes to cover
quick running makes this into a brace after Roy tucked it off his hip through square leg
uses his wrists again and takes a straight delivery behind square on the leg side
that's a mighty strike! Comes down the pitch then swings a back-of-a-length delivery high over midwicket into the stands, lovely free swing of the arms
uses his feet again, Anwar saw him and banged the ball, Roy went for the pull but could only splice to midwicket
a bouncer, loops over Roy's head, a good take by Sarfraz but it's too short for the umpire
back on a length outside off, punched firmly just to the right of mid-off
a slower ball outside off, taken into the leg side
back of a length, a flick of his wrists locates mid-on but he's too deep to stop the single
on off stump, driven to mid-off
short of a length outside off, angled down to third man
another fantastic strike by Roy as he comes down the pitch and cracks a skimming lofted drive over wide mid-on which hammers into the advertising board
now he brings out a variation of the scoop, moving across outside off and paddles the ball over short fine leg
another short ball, outside off, pulled from one leg to deep square
well bowled, short of a length, good pace and nips back a touch...defended to the leg side
strikes first ball! Boom Boom is at the party. Hales trying to flick a shortish delivery through the leg side, the ball skidding on straight and takes Hales around the knee roll
full at off stump, a nice-looking drive first ball which finds cover
another shorter delivery, not quite so quick this time, 62mph, pushed to the covers
gives himself a touch of room outside leg stump then drives a full delivery square over the off side...smart batting
quicker, straighter, takes some bat, I think, as Hales looked to turn it away, into the pad
fuller at the stumps, driven to cover
round the wicket, outside off, Roy is across and trying to scoop it over fine leg but doesn't make contact
that's high....and not quite long enough for six, but evades mid-on running back. Down the pitch, a straight-bat strike through the line of the ball down the ground
short of a length, follows Roy a little, pulled sweetly in front of square and deep square leg has to slide
slower delivery, full outside off, he is nearly through his shot early but manges to squirt it towards point
back of a length, Vince coming down the pitch, punched towards mid-off
full outside off, 81mph, his bottom hand comes through the drive and sends the ball down the on side
slapped away through the covers
down the pitch, Afridi holds the delivery back a little, Vince plays a controlled loft over cover
this slides on, beats Roy's inside edge and takes his front pad

he's held it with a juggle! Two, maybe three grabs for Sarfraz. Roy went for a slog sweep, thin bottom edge I think, Sarfraz couldn't glove it cleanly, the ball bounced between his gloves, pads, a bit of leg perhaps as well before he does very well to grab it inches above the ground
goodness, what happened there? Root has lost his bat. Afridi skids another delivery into the pads, going down leg, and Root loses the grip on his bat
comes forward, takes a thick outside edge into the covers
tossed up full outside off, driven square through point
dragged down short and pulled through midwicket without much timing
short outside off, Root fetches it from very wide and pulls down to long on
that's a massive half-tracker but Vince can only slice it out to deep cover
nice bit of touch play from Root as he hangs back and dabs this very fine past the keeper towards third man
just finds the gap! Ends up being a one-handed slog sweep, took more top edge than middle, but split the difference between long on and deep midwicket
round the wicket, way down the leg side, Vince misses his flick
straighter delivery, swept off the stumps to deep square
fired in at the pads, flicked through square leg
full and straight, flicked away
short outside leg stump, goes down on his back knee and sweeps to deep square
fired in quick and flat, a slightly painful blow for Vince as he misses his sweep...good start for Malik
on the stumps, which Root exposes his he plays back, opens the face and finds point
heaved from full at off stump down the ground to long on
slugged into the leg side
full and straight, he presses forward and the ball rolls into the leg side
just singles at the moment as this finds deep square leg
nicely bowled, a touch fuller with a hint of spin, he drives and gets a thick outside edge to backward point
fired in full at the pads from round the wicket, Root can't get it away
makes a good connection this time, the delivery was slightly straighter, he got all the way underneath it and slog-swept over deep midwicket

finds midwicket this time! He looked to have connected well again - another slog sweep, although the ball was a touch wider on off stump - but Afridi times his leap to perfection to pluck it out of the air. Afridi everywhere tonight
full and straight, flicked along the ground through midwicket and he can make it into a second which doesn't impress Afridi
tucked into the leg side
gets across onto off stump, flicks this way and it's that man again at midwicket as Afridi makes a good diving save
short down the leg side, Vince goes for the pull...it's called wide although Sarfraz appeals for a catch
a slower-ball bouncer, Vince manages to wait just long enough and pull it down to long leg
huge appeal for caught behind! Buttler driving outside off, nice delivery at good pace
fuller, at the stumps, 93mph - serious heat - dropped into the off side
loses his shape a bit as he tries to pull a delivery that wasn't really that short, comes off the bottom edge towards long leg
short of a length on the pads, shovelled out to deep square leg

dropped and parried for six!, Sohail Tanvir at long-on who can't quite pull in the catch...it was a slower ball from Wahab which Buttler clubbed down the ground. Tanvir got to the ball with a leap but it burst through his hands. Tough catch, but seen plenty of them taken
appeal for lbw as he misses a reverse sweep but that probably pitched outside leg
oh, boy, that's a delightful shot...any format, any day...comes down the pitch on the line of leg stump and plays the picture-perfect loft cover drive between the deep fielders. So classy
goes leg side this time, a strong slog-sweep through square leg, not quite the elegance of the previous shot but equally effective
flatter this time but it's the same result for Vince from the same shot as he pulls out another sweep, this time just in front of square...top placement
poor delivery, low full toss outside leg stump, but it's just a single as Vince flicks to deep square leg
on the pads, tickled to short fine leg and it's a tight(ish) single but safe enough in the end
he tries to get a wide here, the ball heading down leg, but actually ends up padding it away
full and straight, pushed into the covers
steps back to the leg side and cuts in front of square, challenges the arm of Rafatullah at deep cover and they win easily
third for Afridi! Big blow, too. Vince goes for the sweep, gets a meaty top edge which settles comfortably into the hands of deep backward square leg
driven into the off side, Afridi comes across himself and then dives to cut off the single...excellent stuff
can't get this away, a straight delivery, worked to the leg side and Afridi quickly onto it again
he's across his crease straight away and flicks a delivery from outside off behind square on the leg side...they make two at a canter
fumble at midwicket! Could have been tight. He flicked it straight at midwicket and set off
short outside off, Buttler tries to upper cut and doesn't make contact
a yorker is squeezed away through the leg side and this time deep square can stop the second
comes down the pitch, outside the line of leg stump, Anwar sees the batsman move and drops the ball in short...Billings lets it through to the keeper
a straight, low full toss which he pumps down to long on
round the wicket, Billings across his crease and trying one of those sweep/scoops to a length ball...actually comes straight off the helmet!
beats him with a short-of-a-length ball which he tries to square drive...Buttler hasn't got going yet
that's come out wrong, a dragged down slower short ball outside off which loops through to Sarfraz
out of the middle? You bet it is...a back-of-a-length delivery is pulled way back into the stands at deep midwicket. That just kept going
and another! What a wonderful strike! Tanvir went fuller and Buttler went straighter, dispatches a length delivery way over the long-on boundary
low full toss outside off, takes the toe-end of the bat into the covers
well bowled, full and straight, Billings does well to power it into the off side and almost manages to thread the gap between cover and mid-off but the latter gets around in time
now it's Billings' turn to go straight down the ground, Wahab round the wicket at pace but Billings gets underneath the full delivery and launches it over long on
swing and a miss this time, drags the length back a little, angling into Billings who tries to heave it a little squarer into the leg side

wonderful catch! Super stuff from Umar Akmal at long on...it's one of the boundary parries we see fairly often these days. Billings dragged the delivery from outside off down the ground. Akmal takes the catch very close to the rope, his momentum makes it hard to balance, he knows he's about to topple over the boundary but manages to flick it up, then steps over the boundary and is able to return to the field of play to hold the catch a second time. Great effort.
full and wide outside off...a late call of wide. Wahab and Afridi bemused by that. Buttler did appear to play over the top of it. Borderline.
full at off stump, driven back past Wahab as he sprawls in his follow through
a low, straight full toss which he can't get further than the bowler...Wahab again showing excellent commitment as he dives across
a shorter delivery, 90mph, did Willey for a pace a little but he manages to pull it into the leg side
slower ball outside off, dragged into the leg side and down to long on
full invention from Buttler comes to nought this time, starts to shape for the scoop over fine leg but the ball is full outside off so aims over third man...ends up missing
a skimming drive over cover, full outside off and this time Buttler opts for something more conventional...his bottom hand brings the added power and that whistled to the boundary
goes short, Buttler goes on the hook...takes a fair amount of top edge but it's a safe shot because fine leg is inside the circle and it clears the long leg boundary in any event

he strikes back! Buttler halted in his tracks as he tries another of those reverse scoops to third man. It was a slower ball and he just got a very thin graze through to the keeper. Muted celebration from Tanvir
low full toss, Plunkett drives his first ball down to long off
edged and gone! Pakistan hitting back. Full outside off, it was there for the shot but Plunkett just got a thick outside edge to Sarfraz
full and straight, good bowling, worked down to long on

dropped!, Tanvir has shelled another...Willey aiming a mighty shot over the off side, skews off the face miles into the air. Tanvir came in from third man. Had loads of time underneath it but it popped out of the hard hands
caught this time! Picks out deep square leg. Short ball, clever bowling, Willey connected cleanly but placed it perfectly to the man
down the leg side, poor delivery
full toss is struck cleanly down the ground but straight to long off
slices this off the thick outer part of the bat square over the off side, lands in space towards deep point
round the wicket, full and straight, heaved into the leg side and Woakes urges Rashid to come back for a second...good call
low full toss, he can only get it as far as cover on the edge of the circle
back of a length, a powerful drive but he goes straight to deep cover...lot of effort for a single
that's a bonus boundary, the full toss is wider outside off this time and Woakes is able to slice it through backward point and wide of third man
full and straight, swings to leg and it dribbles off the inside edge which helps them get back for a second although Afridi not impressed with the fielding...again

ends with a boundary! Good finish from Woakes as he square drives another full toss from outside off, it scoots behind behind point and third man should probably have cut that off having reached it with a dive
